00017 using namespace mrpt;
00018 using namespace mrpt::poses;

00020 
00021 void NavigationChallenge::AutonomousMode(string& waypointsFile, bool challange)
00022 {
00023         mrpt::utils::CConfigFileMemory * config = new mrpt::utils::CConfigFileMemory();
00024         config->write("MOTOR","COM_port_LIN","/dev/ttyS1");
00025         config->write("MOTOR", "MAX_FORWARD_LEFT", 400 );
00026         config->write("MOTOR", "MAX_FORWARD_RIGHT", 400 );
00027         config->write("MOTOR", "MAX_REVERSE_LEFT", -400 );
00028         config->write("MOTOR", "MAX_REVERSE_RIGHT", -400 );
00029         MotorController::setConfigFile(config);
00030 
00031         //interface that will be used by the reactive nav to sense the environment and make the robot move
00032         YClopsReactiveNavInterface* interface = new YClopsReactiveNavInterface();
00033         //initial position
00034         mrpt::poses::CPose2D pose = CPose2D();
00035         float v = 0;
00036         float w = 0;
00037 
00038 
00039         interface->getCurrentPoseAndSpeeds(pose, v,w);
00040         double lat = pose.x();
00041         double lon = pose.y();
00042 
00043         cout << "lat: " << lat << " lon: " << endl;
00044         // solves the tsp problem, it autonomous challenge we need to add some code here to make it work.
00045         TSPNavigation nav = TSPNavigation(lat,lon);
00046 
00047         nav.loadPoints(waypointsFile);
00048         //waypoints in the order we want to visit them
00049         mrpt::aligned_containers<mrpt::poses::CPoint2D>::vector_t points = nav.solve(true);
00050 
00051         cout << "TSP Solved" << endl;
00052         //the reactive nav to get from the current position to the next point the tsp solver wants us to go to
00053         mrpt::reactivenav::YclopsNavigationSystem reactivenav = mrpt::reactivenav::YclopsNavigationSystem(*interface, true, true);
00054 
00055         mrpt::utils::CConfigFile navConfig("robot.ini");
00056         mrpt::utils::CConfigFile robotConfig("robotConf.ini");
00057 
00058         reactivenav.loadConfigFile(navConfig,robotConfig);
00059 
00060         cout << "Reactive nav intialized" << endl;
00061 
00062         mrpt::aligned_containers<mrpt::poses::CPoint2D>::vector_t::iterator iter = points.begin();
00063         mrpt::aligned_containers<mrpt::poses::CPoint2D>::vector_t::iterator end = points.end();
00064 
00065         //go until there aren't anymore waypoints
00066         while (iter != end)
00067         {
00068                 //setting up the next waypoint
00069                 mrpt::reactivenav::CAbstractReactiveNavigationSystem::TNavigationParams   navParams;
00070                 navParams.target.x = iter->x();
00071                 navParams.target.y = iter->y();
00072                 //distance from the waypoint in meters before the robot considers itself at the point
00073                 navParams.targetAllowedDistance = challange ?  0.20f: 7.0f;
00074                 navParams.targetIsRelative = !challange;
00075 
00076                 cout << "navigating to " << navParams.target.x << " " << navParams.target.y << endl;
00077                 //gives the reactive nav the next goal
00078                 reactivenav.navigate( &navParams );
00079                 while(reactivenav.getCurrentState() !=
00080                                                 mrpt::reactivenav::CAbstractReactiveNavigationSystem::NAVIGATING);
00081                 //go until it makes it to the point
00082                         while(reactivenav.getCurrentState() ==
00083                                                         mrpt::reactivenav::CAbstractReactiveNavigationSystem::NAVIGATING)
00084                 {
00085                         reactivenav.navigationStep();
00086                 }
00087                 ++iter;
00088         }
00089         //time for a victory dance
00090         for(int i = 0; i < 100; i++)
00091                 {
00092                         float v = .2;
00093                         float w = 40;
00094                         float time = 100000;
00095                         interface->changeSpeeds(v,w);
00096                         usleep(time);
00097                 }
00098 
00099 }
